abstract: NHL Roundup; NHL clears Chicago Blackhawks forward Patrick Kane of any wrongdoing in off-season rape case; other hockey news noted.

headline.print_headline: League Clears Kane Over a Rape Allegation
headline.main: N.H.L. Clears Patrick Kane Over a Rape Allegation

snippet: The league said Kane, a star Blackhawks forward, would not face any disciplinary action, ruling the allegation against him was unfounded.
lead_paragraph: The league said Kane, a star Blackhawks forward, would not face any disciplinary action, ruling the allegation against him was unfounded.
